title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water. Fry the pancetta in a pan. Beat the eggs with pecorino cheese. Combine the spaghetti with the pancetta and the egg mixture. Add black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste. Grill the chicken until cooked through. Simmer the tomato puree in a pan, add cream, and mix in the grilled chicken. Serve with rice or naan.
